feat: Task and TaskFeedback actions

chore: remove deprecated Feedback.srv

refactor(base.py): refactor BaseHMINode constructor to accept robot_description_package parameter and handle it accordingly

data.author: Kajetan Rachwał
data.message:
feat: add grouding dino ros2 node (#81)

* Initial commit adding interfaces and grounding dino

* Update gitignore to include ros build dirs

* Create README with installation instructions, reproducible install

* Add launch files, finalise readme

* pre-commit format

* Remove unnecessary tests

* Remove weights from .gitignore

* Add grounding dino as poetry dependency

* Update package README

* Update base docs

* Add missing dependancy to docs

* Remove venv from .gitignore

* Formatting

* Add vision_msgs as dependency

* Fix typos

* Add automatic download of weights

* Add README

* Update README.md

* prettier

* fix build

* update docs with pythonpath modification

* Update src/rai_grounding_dino/README.md

Co-authored-by: Bartek Boczek <22739059+boczekbartek@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update src/rai_interfaces/package.xml

Co-authored-by: Bartek Boczek <22739059+boczekbartek@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update src/rai_interfaces/package.xml

Co-authored-by: Bartek Boczek <22739059+boczekbartek@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update src/rai_interfaces/package.xml

Co-authored-by: Bartek Boczek <22739059+boczekbartek@users.noreply.github.com>

* rm redundant file

* add rosidl_generator to package xml for interfaces

---------

Co-authored-by: Bartek Boczek <22739059+boczekbartek@users.noreply.github.com>

data.author: Maciej Majek
data.message:
feat: human robot interface (#88)

* feat: documents loader

* feat: enhance typing, drop logging

* feat: talk to docs app

* build: update deps

* style: remove tools.py:138:59: E203 whitespace before ':'

* build: add parser dependencies

* feat: use StateGraph instead of Graph

* feat: implement rai-tts node (#83)

* feat: implement rai-tts node

* refactor: allow empty elevenlabs api key

* chore: remove poetry lock

* feat: asr node (#48)

* feat: added asr node

* build: added sounddevice to poetry

* feat: added publishing string transcription messages by a topic

* feat: model and language as input parameters

* feat: parametrize node, add launch file

* refactor: rename asr package into rai_asr

* test: remove default tests

* chore: update package.xml, minor changes

* build: update pyproject, add docs for deps that cant be installed using rosdep

* chore: update description and license in setup.py

* Update base docs

* docs: add node readme, add portaudio to deps

* refactor: replace poratudio2 with portaudio19-dev

* feat: add status topic

* chore: remove poetry lock

---------

Co-authored-by: maciejmajek <maciej.majek@robotec.ai>
Co-authored-by: Maciej Majek <46171033+maciejmajek@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: rachwalk <kajetan.rachwal@robotec.ai>

* feat: add proof-of-concept HMI node (#85)

* feat: add an initial implementation for the HMI node

* chore: add missing files to make rai_hmi into a ROS2 package

* docs: add README.md for rai_hmi package

* chore: add comments describing the logic in handle_human_message

* chore: fix code formatting with pre-commit script

* fix: fix typo in topic name

* fix: apply changes from review

* chore: replace single quotes with double quotes

---------

Co-authored-by: Maciej Majek <46171033+maciejmajek@users.noreply.github.com>

* chore: add poetry.lock

* feat: add rai_bringup package, align topic names

* feat: parametrize hri launch file

* feat: vector store retrieval for rai_whoami

* feat: identity service for rai_whoami

* feat: request constitution and identity in rai_hmi node

* feat: add documentation access to the hmi node

* chore: rename identity to robot_identity.txt

* feat: add vector database and robot identity to husarion_whoami, update load_docs script

* fix: load docs path, identity path

* refactor: move load docs to rai_cli

* feat: add configuration package parameter to hmi

* fix: change elevenlabs voice

* feat: add asr latch mechanism

* fix: load model once

* refactor: use openai cloud based whisper

* refactor: asr lock

* style: clean up asr node

* fix: final touch

* docs: add information on creating robot's whoami

* docs: add RAI_bringup info (hri)

* Fixed resuming recording after receiving empty message
